## The Answer to "How Will My Changes Reflect on the Site?"

**Short Answer:**
Push your changes to the `main` branch, and they will automatically appear on the live site in 1-2 minutes via GitHub Actions.

**Key Points:**
- ‚úÖ Only the `main` branch triggers deployment
- ‚úÖ Deployment is automatic (via GitHub Actions)
- ‚úÖ Takes 1-2 minutes from push to live
- ‚úÖ Live site: https://laxminarayan24.github.io/Happy-Birthday/
